mapper.sql:
FROM memberCard a left join member b on a.member_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND member_seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_memberCard ,a.card_defaultNy ,a.card ,a.DelNy ,b.nm ,b.id
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_memberCard ,a.card_defaultNy ,a.card ,a.DelNy FROM memberCard a WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberCard SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
